title: FR: Make sorting connections reversible
author: rubaboo
body_snippet:
<!-- Feature Request -->
<!-- If you file a feature request, please delete the bug section -->
It's easy to screw up a carefully ordered list of connections by hitting the sort button. Please implement one of these (in order of preference):
1. make the sort button into a switch: down = sorted, up = custom ordered
2. an option to disable the sort connections functionality
3. a confirmation dialog: "Sort connections? There is no undo."

comments.author: janborup
comments.snippet: In the version 1.75.7000 it was easy to drag-n-drop sorting, but this feature does not work anymore.
